posts.title: Asenso News Iligan City
posts.description: NATIONAL ICT MONTH, GIBUKSAN Opisyal ng gibuksan ang kasaulogan sa  National  Information Communication Technology o ICT Month diin miduyog ang Lokal nga Kagamhanan sa Iligan pinanguluhan  sa Information Communication  Technology Center. Adunay 19 ka mga aktibidad nga alang sa tibook bulan nga selebrasyon. Diin  apil niini ang himoong Proficiency Exam alang sa mga ICT Professional, Cyber Security, Digital Literacy, Digital trainings ug uban pa. Ang selebrasyon  sa ICâ€¦

title: Vibe Coding Seminar
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Quisquam, quos.

posts.title: Digital Creatives Hub Iligan
posts.description: ğ—§ğ—µğ—² ğ—œğ—»ğ˜ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—±ğ˜‚ğ—°ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ—©ğ—¶ğ—¯ğ—² ğ—–ğ—¼ğ—±ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—§ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¸ ğ—¢ğ—³ğ—³ ğ—®ğ˜ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ——ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—–ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ˜€ ğ—›ğ˜‚ğ—¯ The Digital Creatives Hub â€“ Iligan hosted Introduction to Vibe Coding: Building with AI â€” a beginner-friendly session that welcomed participants into the world of AI-assisted development. Led by Mr. Alexander Burias, AI Consultant at Daloy Tech OPC and CTO/CEO of Tag Sing Co., the session explored how tools like Gemini and bolt.new allow users to create a landing page for a website using just natural language prompts â€” no coding experience needed. As part of the activity, participants were able to build their own landing pages by giving specific prompts, gaining hands-on experience in using AI to generate layouts and design structures. This session served as an introductory training, sparking interest for deeper workshops that will cover how to make websites work â€” including button functionality, page linking, and interactive components. Organized by DEVCON Iligan through the DEVCON Kids Program, the event is part of ICT Month 2025, in partnership with the City Government of Iligan under Mayor Frederick Siao, DICT Iligan, the ICTC Department, and the Center for Digital Iligan, Innovation & Sustainability (CDIIS).
